neighbors.name: Brenda Sue Kendrick
neighbors.claims: County assessment records for the parcel linked in the draft (R59670) list the owner as Matthew Michael Mussatti, not Brenda Sue Kendrick ([appr.wycokck.org](https://appr.wycokck.org/Property-Detail/PropertyQuickRefID/R59670/utils/trees)). Extensive searches of Wyandotte County property and public records did not verify a resident or landowner by this name; the draft PIN likely refers to a financial figure found in unrelated county documents rather than a valid parcel ID ([budget.kansas.gov](https://budget.kansas.gov/wp-content/uploads/fy2006-gov-bdg-rpt-vol-1.pdf)). Consequently, no stance or community influence could be verified for this profile.
neighbors.influence_justification: Residency and property ownership could not be verified

approach_recommendations.engage: Verify identity and property ownership before attempting engagement, as public records do not link this individual to the cited location.

neighbors.name: Jessica L. Mazur & Austin Mazur
neighbors.claims: Jessica and Austin Mazur reside at a property on Donahoo Road in Kansas City, Kansas ([simplecontacts.com](https://www.simplecontacts.com/state/KS/Kansas-City/Donahoo-Road)). Austin Mazur operates a local business, Mazur Renovation, which provides residential remodeling services in the Kansas City metropolitan area ([mazurrenovationjoc.wixsite.com](https://mazurrenovationjoc.wixsite.com/home)). There are no available public records indicating their stance on renewable energy or development projects in Wyandotte County.
neighbors.influence_justification: Small business owner; no public office found

approach_recommendations.engage: Connect through community pride and home value interests. A fellow community member or local business peer could discuss how the project might enhance the neighborhood and address any quality-of-life questions.
